programme.desc: Tok Amat dan Nek Mah sangat gembira apabila raya tahun ini, kesemua anak, menantu, dan cucu balik ke kampung. Namun demikian, menantu sulung mereka, Katijah seperti tidak gembira beraya di kampung.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S6 - Skybound - EP 2
programme.desc: With the defeat of Morro's ghost invasion, the ninja have now become huge media celebrities. But dark forces once more threaten NINJAGO Island as the Teapot of Tyrahn is rediscovered by the ghost of Clouse, Master Chen's former right-hand man. He allows Nadakhan, an evil Djinn and captain of the infamous Misfortunes Keep, to escape the teapot. Nadakhan takes to the skies with the Sky Pirates and prepares to attack.

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 7

programme.title: Martha Bakes S10 - EP 1
programme.desc: "Martha Bakes" fulfills Martha's Stewart's long-time dream of creating a visual teaching course that features the best of the best in home baking. Based on her many years of experimenting, teaching and research, this Baking 101 destination delivers a thoughtfully edited collection of Martha's personal favorites, from savories to sweets.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: A boy and his mother move to California for a new job. He struggles to fit in, as a group of karate students starts to bully him for dating a rich girl from their clique. It's up to the Japanese landlord, Miyagi, to teach him karate.

programme.title: The ZhuZhus - EP 8
programme.desc: The ZhuZhuPets are no ordinary pets, they are EXTRAORDINARY and they can talk! Always on a quest for fun, they have to stay on their tiny toes to keep up with the non-stop action, laughs and adventures.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series Yr 1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Based on Walt Disney Animation Studios Oscar-winning feature film.

programme.title: Power Rangers Ninja Steel - EP 9

programme.title: Transformers Robots In Disguise S4 - EP 22

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 47

programme.title: Totally Totto - EP 8
programme.desc: Isaac Ng has never been good in science, and gets bored in class easily. He wishes he could develop a passion for it, just like his scientist father. Little does he know he's about to get what he wished for - in the form of Totto, a genius bunny who takes him on many fun and crazy adventures in science! Totally Totto is a live action series with an adorable puppet and animation-filled segments that brings science to your fingertips.

Sure they are different, sure they make mistakes but through it all, the Astroblast family embraces their differences, makes new friends and discovers that working together makes everything better.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2 - EP 21
programme.desc: There's a heat wave in the forest, and Hiccup, Sneeze and Bibi are feeling hot and worn out. They come up with different ways to beat the heat.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 19
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets, along with his best friend, Ruby invents his way out of every jam by re-purposing parts and objects into the coolest contraption ever.

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: From unexpected dinosaur pets and dragon guests to surprise treasure hunts and beyond, hilarious magical adventures are never far away with the two genies-in-training and three wishes a day.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 38
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Home Together - EP 29
programme.desc: Join hosts Suhaimi Yusof and Hossan Leong as they speak to guests, from artistes, athletes to policy-makers on their personal stories and how they are copying amidst the COVID-19 situation. Catch performances by local artistes and musicians and learn how to whip up quick meals with celebrity chefs, Angela May, Chef Bob, Sarah Benjamin Huang and Chef Bala in this variety show.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37 - EP 7080
programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Kin - EP 406
programme.desc: Ah Hock and Rickson fall out when the latter tells Debbie about Ah Hock's affair. Kenneth's dating hits a bumpy road as he fans off younger women with Daddy issues.

programme.title: My Sassy Neighbour - EP 2
programme.desc: Gordon, Community TV's new hunky host, has convinced Madam Tan to share her story with the community. Madam Tan doesn't want publicity, but since it'll help Gordon settle into his job, she agrees to it. But a feuding mother and sister of a soon-to-be-married couple distract Madam Tan with their communication problems. Meanwhile, Gordon tries to settle in with his brother Yu Jin, whom he has not seen since he was five.

programme.title: Body And Soul S7 - EP 3
programme.desc: The term Computer Vision Syndrome was unheard of till the last few years or so. Computer vision syndrome affects our eyes and is caused by uninterrupted periods of time that the eye is focused on a computer or a digital screen. With the rise of technology and its significant role in our daily lives, how do we protect ourselves from computer vision syndrome? Can this syndrome potentially cause myopia or worsen our myopia levels?

programme.title: Odd Squad S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Odd Squad is a high-tech agency run by kids equipped with the world's most advanced and unpredictable gadgetry. The agents investigate weird and unusual phenomena around them and use math to put things right.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 26
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: OddBods S2 - EP 19
programme.desc: The Oddbods are back! Watch 7 friends survive the perils of everyday life, where ordinary situations spiral into extraordinary events. A non-dialogue comedy that captures the madcap yet charming antics of the Oddbods - celebrating success where they can find it and taking failure in their stride.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S9 - EP 6
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends.The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 49
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Museum Mysteries - EP 6
programme.desc: Time-travelling historian and explorer extraordinaire, Captain Mer Lai En, is on a quest to recruit crew members to join him on his artefact collecting missions all around the world and all across time! Not only do crew members have to help solve all of the Captain's challenges and puzzles in his museum, they must also help Captain Mer Lai En fix the time-machine's flux chronometer. Will they succeed? Find out in Museum Mysteries!

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos: Top 10 Countdown S2b - EP 5

Will Sen Mei agrees to the request? Will she eventually reconciles with Zi Jun? (PG)(重)(大结局)子骏被绑架，大耳窿要森美拿犯罪证据来交换。森美决定交出证据，但子骏不甘失去能证明森美清白的证据，乘机抢夺，过程中曼蓉被刺受伤。手术后，曼蓉假装脚伤不能行走，要森美将子骏让给她。森美是否会答应？她和子骏能否复合？.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Capital 958 - EP 8

programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Youbao is accused of murdering Haixing but he explains he only helped to bury the body. Inspector Tao doubts his claims and he is sentenced to life imprisonment for possessing weapons and murder. (重)警方认定海星是被友宝杀害的，友宝解释他只是埋尸，并没有杀人，并说出海星受人指使前来杀他的事，他照顾海星也是想知道幕后人是谁。陶探长觉得他的说辞很牵强，结果友宝因杀人和拥有枪械，被判终身监禁。.

(PG)(重)林綉明正在与一种罕见的癌症搏斗。 由于他的病让他与家人少了相聚的时间，他想趁现在弥补失去的时光并履行对妻子之前的誓言。“聚爱圆梦"团队知綉明的愿望后，决定以迟来的希腊蜜月旅行让他和妻子重申誓言，让綉明和他的妻子感到惊喜。.

Dabaos father bought him home, to live with their family. (重)小小美猴王要成为真正的美猴王 ,还需要学习许许多多的本领，于是他外出学艺。在途中为了躲避小狗，他变成一个布娃娃，被大宝爸爸买回家，与他们全家人生活在一起。.

programme.title: 无饭不起早 Delicacies At Sunrise - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) After the sun rises, people enjoy different kinds of food for breakfast. This programme focuses on specialty food for breakfast in different places of China, tells the stories about breakfast and manifests philosophies of life. (重)日出之时，百千滋味。表象口腹之欲，实测心智之养。这个节目走遍全国，跨越南北，聚焦各地特色早餐，讲述市井街边的早餐故事。.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe LOVE 972 - EP 30
programme.desc: Join Kenneth & Lee Nah 'LIVE' from the studios of Love 972.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 24
programme.desc: Qingchen lured Elder Dingshui (Elder dark sorceress) to appear. A fight ensued and Elder Dingshui escaped after being wounded. Qingchen released her trusty golden butterfly to track down Elder Dingshui, but the golden butterfly could not pass through the Lotus Pond. (PG)卿尘设计引定水暗巫长老现身，经过一番交手后定水负伤逃离。卿尘放出金蝶追踪，但金蝶无法通过莲池宫。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 401
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 你也可以是天使3 You Can Be An Angel 3 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Yu Tian finds out that her younger brother Yao Yang transferred to work in the same hospital as her; she asks Yao Yang to keep their relationship a secret. Si Yan misunderstands that Yu Tian and Yao Yang are having an underground relationship when she sees both of them interact intimately. He Tang is a patient who often admits to the hospital; Yuan Bin, Ruo Jun and Yu Tian study his case and concludes that he is feeling unwell because of loneliness, they decide to let CCT follow his case. (PG)(重)雨恬意外发现弟弟耀阳转职与自己同院，要他对别人隐瞒两人的关系。耀阳嘻皮笑脸，与姐姐开玩笑。思彦见两人互动亲密，误会两人在搞地下情。河堂经常入院，袁斌、若君、雨恬研究了他的档案后，断定他是因为生活空虚，才会经常感觉不舒服入院，决定由CCT跟进此个案。.

programme.title: Stronger As One
programme.desc: Join Joanna Dong and the Singapore Symphony Choruses in a song of hope in this 15-minute special as Singapore continues its fight against Covid-19. Ordinary people also share their experiences of these extraordinary times, and show that by pulling together, Singapore is Stronger as One.

programme.title: 她她她的少女時代 Girlie Days - EP 2
programme.desc: (Part 2) Yingfeng goes job hunting again with Zhang Qing's support. However, her twenty years of experience in catering is outdated. She loses her confidence and resorts to confide her unhappiness to her buddies. (PG)(第2集下)迎风重新寻找工作，获张晴支持。可惜迎风的二十年餐饮经验已经过时，更感自卑，只好向姊妹团吐苦水。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 9
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 年节时亲友团聚在一起围炉是华人文化非常重要的一件大事！但是想要作出一顿丰盛的围炉晚餐，采买却是一件令人头痛的事情！詹姆士带领一群好友去市场采买，告诉大家采买的秘诀。更邀请了好友曾国城、张本渝共同完成一桌令人惊艳的年节大餐喔！.

programme.title: 剃头刀 阿签传奇 Titoudao: Inspired By The True Story Of A Wayang Star - EP 11
programme.desc: In the 80s, television dramas rise in popularity, and wayang troupes' performance opportunities gradually decline. Ah Zai has no choice but to accept other job offers behind Master Gwee's back. Upon finding out, Master Gwee is extremely angry as he feels that they have embarrassed the troupe. (PG-部分画面令人不安)80年代，电视剧开始受欢迎，歌仔戏逐渐没落，演出时台下观众寥寥无几。阿财没有办法，只好瞒着魏文，接下在葬礼上唱歌的工作，以赚取收入。魏文知道后气得发抖，觉得他们丢尽戏班的脸。阿财顶撞魏文，两人爆发冲突。.

(PG13-画面令人不安)(第2集上)王久儿承认自己是罗大可的情人。两人本来快结婚了，但罗大可一发现王久儿曾经整容就取消婚约，还间接害她流产。王久儿怀恨在心，把罗大可给杀了。.

All he yearns for is to spend more quality time with his loved ones, and a job that allows him to improve the family's finances. Will his wishes be fulfilled? 十一年前，而凡迪因威胁生命的心脏疾病而失去了职业和独立性。 现在，他被迫依靠一台特殊的机器生存。 他只想要与家人共度美好时光，还有一份让他能够改善家人的财务状况的工作。 他的愿望会成真吗？.

programme.title: 锦衣之下 Under The Power - EP 1

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 5
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. At the end of each episode, relevant spokespersons will share with viewers various precautionary measures one could take when caught in similar situations. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans Of The Earth - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. (重)主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 新生之旅 Rites Of Motherhood - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In Indonesias Bali, all phases of life, from conception to birth, are celebrated in different rites of passage. These rites of birth form the basic framework for the religious life of the people. Every ritual has a specific purpose, and laden with a special meaning. (重)在印度尼西亚的峇厘岛，每一个重要的人生阶段，都以传统的仪式来加以纪念。峇厘岛人是通过不同的习俗，来建立他们和神明的基本关系。每一项仪式，都有不同的涵义和目的。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 71
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yalan agrees to collaborate with Renhai Brewery behind Juxi's back and transfers a huge amount of money to Renhai Brewery as investment funds. Shortly after, Renhai Brewery folds. Yalan is unable to retrieve whatever that she has paid out. Worse, Pung Gil Dang has to repay Renhai Brewery's debts. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰盗用菊熙的名义与仁海酿造合作，还把巨额投资金付给该公司。不久后，仁海酿造倒闭，雅兰一分钱都讨不回，丰吉堂还可能必须承担仁海酿造的债务。理事们要菊熙给他们一个交代。吴春要雅兰出面说是她盗用菊熙的印章在合约书上盖章的。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 72
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Jixiu meets up with Yalan before the shareholders' meeting and makes a secret pact with her. Both Jixiu and Yalan vote for Juxi's dismissal at the shareholders' meeting. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 吉秀在股东大会举行前约雅兰见面，两人达成秘密协议。股东大会上，吉秀代表没有出席的股东们支持将菊熙解任。紧要关头，雅兰也表示支持菊熙被解任。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 17
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Lewen stays with her mother outside the palace temporarily. She thinks of Li Ying when she sees her mother sewing the Heron Orchid pattern. The Queen has a premature baby. She rejects the help of the imperial doctor to deliver her child. After the baby girl is born, and without so much as a glance, she orders someone to get rid of the baby covertly. Yinsheng secretly witnesses Enunch Cheng carrying out the Queen's order...... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)乐温在宫外与母亲暂时住下。她看着母亲绣鹭兰花，又想到自己与李旲，不禁内心酸楚。中殿娘娘提前一月早产，为掩人耳目，她拒绝太医接生，生下女婴后狠心地一眼未看便命人偷偷解决掉。成内官在处理此事时被胤圣暗中看到......

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 18
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) After rescuing the baby girl, Yinsheng keeps her in a brothel. Jin Yijiao and others panic when Li Ying says the assassin who wanted to kill him has been arrested. They are afraid that Li Ying will find out the truth so they decide to kill the assassin in prison... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 胤圣当日救下中殿娘娘的女婴后，将其寄养在青楼，让妓女们帮忙照养。金义教等人听李旲说抓到上次入侵东宫要杀他的剌客后，害怕李旲查到真相，私下里都慌了手脚，意图私下先去牢里杀人灭口......

programme.title: 歌手·当打之年 Singer 2020 - EP 1
programme.desc: The new season of the Chinese variety "Singer" is back with more electric performances from singers such as Jam Hsiao, Hua Chenyu, Zhou Shen, Misia and Lala Hsu etc. (首播)《歌手·当打之年》是湖南卫视推出的音乐竞技节目。该节目的首发歌手为华晨宇、Misia、萧敬腾、徐佳莹、袁娅维、毛不易、周深，由萧敬腾担任该节目的音乐串讲人。节目每期邀请专业歌手进行歌唱竞赛，并提供平等竞技舞台。赛制在基础上作出了重大革新，取消了原有的补位和踢馆机制，设立全新的奇袭赛制。.

programme.title: 我的救护车 My Ambulance - EP 5

programme.desc: A World of Difference is an anthology series, which examines current social issues set in a local alternative present, in an imaginative, light hearted manner with a satirical tone. The story is standalone, with a common character who plays the role of an official in the various stories, example a tax officer, an examination official, a labour office clerk etc. He will be the one to explain rules or deliver results to the main protagonists. (PG-些许性相关语)(首播)《都市狂想》系列通过大胆设想的背景，富有奇幻色彩的故事，带出与社会相关的课题。各单元故事由不同演员主演，只有一位演员将在所有故事中出现，演绎负责不同工作的小公务员，例如税务官、考官等。.

programme.title: 维多利亚的模力 VIC - EP 5
programme.desc: Fortunately, Juno's timely rescue saves Vicky from the fall. Vicky bears a grudge against Queenie as she reckons that Queenie's friendliness is merely superficial and is actually scheming against her. Queenie is aggrieved and denies the accusations. After the official elimination of a contestant, the remaining models feel the heightened pressure in the competition. Shi Ren takes this opportunity to bring in a well-known celebrity animal lover, Nicole, as a guest judge. 下坠意外发生，幸好Juno及时出手，让Vicky幸免于难。Vicky气上心头，认为Queenie是表面和善，实则腹黑的心机女有心靠害，Queenie则委屈否认，楚楚可怜，众人都认为Vicky过于咄咄逼人，让Vicky愤愤不平，只好作罢。 在正式淘汰一位参赛者后，节目压力开始增大。世仁趁胜追击，找来了知名爱护动物名人Nicole当嘉宾评审。Nicole带来了一堆萌宠，让难搞的动物跟众模搭配合作，拍出下一轮爱护动物为题的照片。萌宠萌翻众模，但是却是难以沟通的合作对象，让众模伤透脑筋。除了Nicole，众模纷纷叫苦连天。而Vicky却更是可以和分配到的小狗保持距离，让众人大惑不解。Nicole更是借出自己的爱宠——王子，和其中一位“幸运儿"拍照，而这一位“幸运儿"就是…….

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 5
programme.desc: In Vietnam, more than 300 patients died of cancer every day. Jojo Goh visits the biggest cancer facility in Hanoi - the K Hospital to understand how cancer is turning into a health crisis. A trip to a cancer village also reveals a bleak environmental hazard which threatens the people's health. 越南每天有超过300人因癌症不治而丧命。主持人吴俐璇拜访越南北部城市河内最大的癌症医院，了解儿童癌症病患的情况与寻医历程。她也前往城外的一个“癌症村”，发现当地的工业污染日趋严重，严重威胁市民的健康。.

programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Easy-going Salih was leading a good but simple life, taking charge of his father's motorworks repair company, getting ready to marry his secondary school sweetheart, and plenty of time to kick back and watch his favourite tv programmes and films as well as strum on his beloved guitar. However, all that came crashing down when his fiancee broke it all off, citing that he was a dead end going nowhere with his life. To make things worse, his father blurts out how disappointed he is with Salih and that sometimes he feels like kicking him out to force him to make something of his life. Determined to prove her wrong, he makes a drastic move to take up the Polytechnic opportunity that he never took all those years ago.

Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it.

programme.title: Renyai Takbir Raya
programme.desc: Sumayyah was involved in a serious accident while heavily pregnant with Saif. She was diagnosed with a kidney failure and was told that she is not able to conceive again. Three years has past, Sumayyah is given a test again on the eve of Raya.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 15
programme.desc: The village leaders visit Mak Su's house to inform her of Farid's crimes around the village. She refuses to believe their accusations. Tengku Maria drops by Iskandar's house unannounced. Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. Tengku Iskandar receives a warning from his father that if he refuses to change to become a better person, he will not be able to take over TG Holdings.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 11
programme.desc: Nawal finds it hard to juggle with the preparation for their new cafe and her day job. Hanan pleads with Nawal to stop working in order to give her fullest attention in their cafe planning. Megat apologises to Nafisah for making her uncomfortable with his feelings towards her.

programme.title: Learn Together with Me - EP 6
programme.desc: In this final episode , Shahrin Azhar and Marina Yusoff speaks with Dr Nur Farhan Alami, a geriatric specialist, on fall prevention and vascular dementia amongst the elderly. Chef Bob prepares Laksa Tofu'. Dr Wan Rizal, as usual, will demonstrate exercises that can be done from home. KEKAL SIHAT SENTIASA CERGAS is a series targeted at the seniors in our society. Messages on how important it is to be safe during this period, how to improve their physical and mental well-being, and topics like proper eating habits and tips to healthier cooking are weaved into the episodic content in a light-hearted manner. There are also segments on exercising which we aim to encourage seniors to try indoors. The show aims to be entertaining, and yet informative, to bring across the very important social messages that is of utmost importance during these times.

programme.title: Stronger As One

programme.title: #Urbanista - EP 6

programme.title: Manja 5 - EP 9
programme.desc: Maintaining the MANJA branding, the content encompasses guest interviews, fashion, food, games-challenges and more. The format is VT and Live in studio. Each episode carries a specific theme which will thread the segments together. The five key segments are Tamu Minggu Ini (Chat with studio guests), Estetika (Beauty, Styling, Interior Design), Holistik (DIY, Life hacks), Makan Tiub (Food) and Bro-Sis Cuba (Activities). Spotlight (Local Entertainment Highlights will supplement these main segm.

programme.desc: Cempaka and her brother Iman are stepchildren of Tuan Khalid and Marhanna. However Marhanna and her daughter Lara Andrew hated the two siblings and often abused them. Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: In the this daily business show, Ian King tackles the biggest business and economics stories live from Sky's studios in the heart of the City of London.

programme.title: Hanging Spear
programme.desc: World class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller explore the Hanging Spear Gorge. Join world class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller as they explore the Hanging Spear Gorge of the Opalescent River, the highest source of the Hudson and the deepest part of New York State’s High Peaks wilderness.

programme.title: Onekotan
programme.desc: A group of intrepid professional skiers risk it all to ski the remote and desolate Pacific island of Onekotan. Onekotan, a Pacific island with a collapsed volcano at its centre, is one of the most isolated places on earth. The weather is unpredictable, the conditions uninhabitable, and for Matthias Haunholder the draw to ski the foreboding volcano is intense.

programme.title: Cool under Pressure
programme.desc: Cameron Naasz tries to become the first American Crashed Ice World Champion. There's no shortage of pressure for ice cross downhill racer Cameron Naasz. He's racing for the World Championship in front of his hometown crowd, family members, and hundreds of cameras at St Paul, Minnesota, USA – a course he hasn’t won before.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: The newest film from Union Binding features 4K shredding from their stacked roster of riders. With a line-up of riders including Travis Rice, Kazu Kokubo, Gigi Rüf, and Scott Stevens, Union Binding's new film is set to blow minds with a full-length 4K snowboarding shred fest. From big mountain lines to urban rails, this flick has it all.

programme.title: Claim Freedom
programme.sub-title: Exploring the far reaches of imagination
programme.desc: Four adventurers push themselves physically, mentally and spiritually to conquer what once seemed impossible. Four adventurers are given the opportunity to take on once-in-a-lifetime challenges. They’ll push themselves physically, mentally and spiritually to conquer what once seemed impossible.

programme.title: Netherlands: No place like home
programme.desc: Tommie meets Afrojack and Don Diablo in the Netherlands to discuss the role of family in their music. In the Netherlands, DJ Tommie considers the role of family in artistic success. He visits Afrojack at his mother's cafe, and meets Don Diablo to discuss the impact his late father had on his work.

programme.title: Dolomites Descent
programme.desc: Go with Richie Schley as he lives a mountain biker's dream by riding the Dolomites from top to bottom. Richie Schley lives a mountain biker's dream by riding Italy's Dolomites from top to bottom. Take the trip with Richie as he tackles the sheer and austere limestone of the peaks and rips through the forests below the tree line in a ride for the ages.

programme.title: Exploring Madagascar
programme.desc: Slade Prestwich, Frank Solomon and Grant 'Twiggy' Baker embark on an epic surf adventure to Madagascar. Slade Prestwich, Frank Solomon and Grant 'Twiggy' Baker embark on an epic adventure to the previously unsurfed island of Madagascar. They chart new territory, searching for new waves to ride and meeting with local villagers.

programme.title: The making of Danny MacAskill's Imaginate
programme.sub-title: Inside the mind of a trial biking pioneer
programme.desc: An extensive, personal, behind-the-scenes look at Danny MacAskill's surreal bike film Imaginate. Danny MacAskill was given a blank canvas for his action film Imaginate. See all the challenges, experimentation, and fun times that went into making it, from concept to completion.

programme.title: Miami: A tale of two towns
programme.desc: Linking up with Cedric Gervais and the duo Murk, Tommie discovers that EDM in Miami goes beyond South Beach. DJ Tommie Sunshine visits Grammy-winning artist Cedric Gervais to discuss the thriving Miami nightclub scene, then meets the duo known as Murk and discovers that Miami EDM goes way beyond South Beach.

programme.title: Roraima
programme.desc: A trio of climbers launch an expedition to Mount Roraima, a South American peak shrouded in legend. Climbing partners Kurt Albert and Holger Heuber don't know what they're in for when they join competitive climbing superstar Stefan Glowacz for an expedition to Mount Roraima, a steep-walled South American peak shrouded in both rainforest and legend.

programme.title: Red Bull Off-Road Junior Team USA announcement
programme.sub-title: Red Bull Off-Road Junior Team USA
programme.desc: Meet the members of Red Bull Off-Road Junior Team USA as they prepare to compete internationally in 2020. Meet Blade Hildebrand, Seth Quintero and Mitch Guthrie Jr as they look to make the step into the international rally scene in 2020 and to ultimately become the best and most complete off-road drivers in the world.

programme.title: Skate Ethiopia
programme.desc: Madars Apse travels to Ethiopia to discover the growing, 150-strong skate scene in Addis Ababa. When a 60-man crew of international volunteers built a skatepark in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia in 2016, it kick-started a mushrooming cultural revolution in the birthplace of Rastafarianism.

programme.title: How slippery is a supercar?
programme.desc: We seek to replicate the aerodynamic learnings of the Red Bull Holden Racing Team. In a sport where races are won by tenths of a second, we seek to replicate the aerodynamic learnings of the Red Bull Holden Racing Team and apply them to the human body, on a bicycle.

programme.title: Cooking with car parts
programme.desc: What culinary delights are possible with little more than a few key ingredients and a heated brake disc? Race cars are made to withstand and generate extreme heat. So with this heat in mind, what culinary delights are possible with little more than a few key ingredients and a heated brake disc?

programme.title: Danny Larsen
programme.desc: Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist. Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist – and what lesson he learned from snowboarding to dare the leap into creative arts.

programme.title: Eva Sandelgard
programme.desc: The Swedish freerider talks about the thrills of extreme snowboarding and dressing hair at Paris Fashion Week. Swedish Eve Sandelgard is a triple extreme snowboarding world champion and an haute couture hairdresser. Hear the story of her double life, from first female descents down Mont Blanc, France and Denali (Mt McKinley), Alaska to Paris Fashion Week.

programme.title: Jon Olsson Invitational
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with the world’s finest freeskiers in the 2015 Jon Olsson Invitational. Go behind the scenes of what it’s like to take on the world’s finest freeskiers in the 2015 Jon Olsson Invitational Big Air event with Øystein Braaten, Jesper Tjäder and Oscar Wester.

programme.title: Closing Out the Season
programme.desc: The boys take one last opportunity to seize the snow and show winter they own it. As the season comes to an end, the boys take one last opportunity to seize the snow and show winter they own it. Watch as Øystein Bråten and Oscar Wester head to the last bit of snow left at Tiril Parken in Geilo, Norway.
